day: Closure Scheduled for W Main St:
event: Saturday August 29 and Sunday August 30 from 6 a.m. to 4 p.m. each day.

day: Closure Scheduled for W Main St:
event: W Main St CLOSED between N Broadway and Algonquin St.  Detours in place.  Motorists should plan routes accordingly.

day: Closure Scheduled for W Main St:
event: The closure is necessary for demolition of the overhead pedway in front of the Civic Center.

day: Interstate Ramp Closure Scheduled in Fayette Co:
event: Sunday August 30 at 7 p.m. thru Monday August 31 at 5 a.m.

day: Interstate Ramp Closure Scheduled in Fayette Co:
event: At the northern 75/64 split, the ramp from I-75S to I-64W is scheduled to be closed for high friction surface installation.

day: Interstate Ramp Closure Scheduled in Fayette Co:
event: Detour:  I-75S to Exit 115/Newtown Pike, turn left onto Newtown Pike, then access the entrance ramp to the right for I-75N/I-64W.
All scheduled events are either cancelled or postponed until further notice.
Please follow all CDC guidelines as well as city and Kentucky state government directives and recommendations.
